info.author: Friedrich Paetzke
info.description:
ldtp-recorder
=============

Copyright 2012-2013 Friedrich Paetzke (f.paetzke@gmail.com)

This program translates GUI Events to executable commands that fit the
Linux Desktop Testing Project (LDTP, http:*/ldtp.freedesktop.org*).

Usage
-----

$ ./ldtp-recorder.py [gui]

Requirements
------------

* python 2.7
* pyatspi2
* ldtp

Development
-----------

Debug:
	There is a LDTP_RECORDER_DEBUG environment variable.
	See src/debug.py for more Information.

For more information take a look at http://www.vanneva.com/page/ldtp-recorder
